ticket.title: Digest-first scale validation: summary receipts, bounded control planes, replay-safe projection

tickets.reason: Authority-binding contracts must be complete before scale verification.
Replay-equivalent event parity is prerequisite for scale replay drills.
Temporal authority hardening is required for deterministic large-scale replay.
Observation-window alias handling must be stable before scale envelope verification.

in_scope: Validate summary-receipt and selector-first supervisory surfaces under high evidence volume.
Validate bounded queue/payload behavior and backpressure accounting for control planes.
Run replay/anti-entropy drills proving projection recovery from ledger+CAS only.
Prove no duplicate external side-effects under retry/restart/partial-loss scenarios.
out_of_scope: Non-FAC product-plane performance tuning unrelated to cutover contracts.

steps: Create scale test fixtures with large evidence fan-out and bounded selector retrieval workflows.
Measure and assert control-plane bounds (payload size, queue depth, drop/backpressure metrics).
Execute replay/anti-entropy recovery drills with projection loss injection.
Capture deterministic performance and correctness evidence artifacts.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: Summary-first supervision remains functional without transcript fan-out.
Control-plane growth is bounded and observable under stress.
Replay/anti-entropy drills recover projection state without duplicate side-effects.

notes.security: Scale tests must preserve authority invariants; throughput never overrides containment/correctness.
notes.verification: Record reproducible stress/replay artifacts with exact selectors and ledger anchors.
